name: Le Me'ng Sauver
description:
You need to use your special ability of saving creatures life state and load/ recall it in right moment otherwise poor creature will fall into oblivion.

Controls:

Click on creature and choose right moment to save it's life state, when needed load saved life state.

"S" - save & "Space" - load. You can rebind in pause menu options.

Mobile friendly with on screen buttons.

BUG: Boxes in hole have iffy collision and may not work on first time to walk over.

Tileset: https://rottingpixels.itch.io/platformer-dungeon-tileset
